pages.text: 56|77|niscaya eta mahimanbita kura'ana [1]
56|78|ya ache suraksita kitabe [1].
56|79|Yara sampurna pabitra tara chara an'ya ke'u ta samparsa kare na [1].
56|80|Eta srstikulera rabera kacha theke nayilakrta.
56|81|Tabu'o ki tomara e banike tuccha ganya karacha [1]
56|82|ara tomara mithyaropake'i tomadera riyika kare niyocha [1]
56|83|sutaram kena naya---praana yakhana kanthagata haya [1]
56|84|ebam takhana tomara takiye thaka
56|85|ara amara tomadera ceye tara kachakachi, kintu tomara dekhate pa'o na [1].
56|86|Atahpara yadi tomara hisaba nikasa o pratiphalera sam'mukhina na ha'o [1]
56|87|tabe tomara ota [1] phira'o na kena? Yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o
56|88|atahpara yadi se naikatyapraaptadera ekajana haya
56|89|tabe tara jan'ya rayeche arama, uttama jibanopakarana o sukhada udyana [1]
56|90|ara yadi se dana dikera ekajana haya
56|91|tabe take bala habe, tomake salama yehetu tumi dana dikera ekajanaâ€™
56|92|kintu se yadi haya mithyaropakari, bibhrantadera ekajana
56|93|tabe tara apyayana habe ati usna panira
56|94|ebam dahana jahannamera
56|95|niscaya eta suniscita satya.
56|96|Ata'eba apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna [1].
57|1|Asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache saba'i allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare [1]. Ara tini parakramasali, prajnamaya [2].
57|2|Asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i; tini jibana dana karena ebam mrtyu ghatana; ara tini'i sabakichura upara ksamatabana.
57|3|Tini'i prathama o sesa; prakasya (upare) o gopana (nikate) ara tini sabakichu samparke samyaka abagata [1].
